cards.title: Cheaty McCheats
cards.body: Cheat
powers: Play the top card of your deck. {CheatyMcCheats} gains 2 HP.
incapacitatedAbilities: Each player may play a card.
Each player may use a power.
Revive one incapacitated hero with 1 HP.

cards.title: Rapid Deployment Device
cards.body: You may play an additional card each turn.

cards.title: Rapid Deployment Aura
cards.body: You may play an additional card each turn.

cards.title: Rapid Deployment Mook
cards.body: You may play an additional card each turn.

cards.title: Multitasking Device
cards.body: You may use an additional power each turn.

cards.title: Multitasking Aura
cards.body: You may use an additional power each turn.

cards.title: Multitasking Mook
cards.body: You may use an additional power each turn.

cards.title: Reloading Device
cards.body: You may draw an additional card each turn.

cards.title: Reloading Aura
cards.body: You may draw an additional card each turn.

cards.title: Reloading Mook
cards.body: You may draw an additional card each turn.

cards.title: Healing Device
cards.body: At the end of your turn, each hero target gains 1 HP.

cards.title: Healing Aura
cards.body: At the end of your turn, each hero target gains 1 HP.

cards.title: Healing Mook
cards.body: At the end of your turn, each hero target gains 1 HP.

cards.title: Shield Device
cards.body: Reduce damage dealt to hero targets by 1.

cards.title: Shield Aura
cards.body: Reduce damage dealt to hero targets by 1.

cards.title: Shield Mook
cards.body: Reduce damage dealt to hero targets by 1.

cards.title: Sword Device
cards.body: Increase damage dealt by targets you control by 1.

cards.title: Sword Aura
cards.body: Increase damage dealt by targets you control by 1.

cards.title: Sword Mook
cards.body: Increase damage dealt by targets you control by 1.

cards.title: Device Mook
cards.body: Hero equipments in play are indestructible

cards.title: Aura Mook
cards.body: Hero ongoings in play are indestructible

cards.title: Soul Mook
cards.body: Hero targets in play can gain HP above their maximum

cards.title: Loud Device
cards.body: At the end of your turn, {CheatyMcCheats} deals each villain target 1 Sonic damage.
powers: {CheatyMcCheats} deals each villain target 1 Sonic damage.

cards.title: Loud Aura
cards.body: At the end of your turn, {CheatyMcCheats} deals each villain target 1 Sonic damage.
powers: {CheatyMcCheats} deals each villain target 1 Sonic damage.

cards.title: Pollution Mook
cards.body: At the end of your turn, {PollutionMook} deals each environment target 1 Toxic damage.

cards.title: Mook With A Bat
cards.body: At the end of your turn, {MookWithABat} deals the nonhero target with the lowest HP 1 melee damage.

cards.title: Mook With A Gun
cards.body: At the end of your turn, {MookWithAGun} deals the nonhero target with the lowest HP 1 projectile damage.

cards.title: Mook With A Laser
cards.body: At the end of your turn, {MookWithALaser} deals the nonhero target with the lowest HP 1 energy damage.

cards.title: Mook With A Flamethrower
cards.body: At the end of your turn, {MookWithAFlamethrower} deals the nonhero target with the lowest HP 1 fire damage.

cards.title: Mook With A FreezeRay
cards.body: At the end of your turn, {MookWithAFreezeRay} deals the nonhero target with the lowest HP 1 cold damage.

cards.title: Mook With A Taser
cards.body: At the end of your turn, {MookWithATaser} deals the nonhero target with the lowest HP 1 lightning damage.

cards.title: Mook With A Poision
cards.body: At the end of your turn, {MookWithAPoison} deals the nonhero target with the lowest HP 1 toxic damage.

cards.title: Mook With A Headache
cards.body: At the end of your turn, {MookWithAHeadache} deals the nonhero target with the lowest HP 1 psychic damage.

cards.title: Mook With A Mic
cards.body: At the end of your turn, {MookWithAMic} deals the nonhero target with the lowest HP 1 sonic damage.

cards.title: Mook With A Smite
cards.body: At the end of your turn, {MookWithASmite} deals the nonhero target with the lowest HP 1 radiant damage.

cards.title: Mook With A Curse
cards.body: At the end of your turn, {MookWithACurse} deals the nonhero target with the lowest HP 1 infernal damage.

cards.title: Take Another Turn
cards.body: You may play a card. You may use a power. You may draw a card.

cards.title: Mook Cannon
powers: {CheatyMcCheats} deals 1 target X energy damage, where X is the number of hero non-character targets in play. {MookCannon} deals each hero non-character target X energy damage.

cards.title: Device Cannon
powers: {CheatyMcCheats} deals 1 target X energy damage, where X is the number of hero equipment cards play. Destroy all hero equipment cards.

cards.title: Burst Aura
powers: {CheatyMcCheats} deals 1 target X energy damage, where X is the number of hero ongoing cards play. Destroy all hero ongoing cards.
